casebody.data:
William METCALF, Jr., Appellee, v. PITTSBURGH ATHLETIC CO., Appellant. No. 7656. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. April 29, 1941. John M. Reed, of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant. Ella Graubart and Patterson, Crawford, Arensberg & Dunn, all of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, CLARK, and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below, 39 F.Supp. 115, is affirmed.
